languages.text: "Неумирающий не отпускает души, что пришли к Нему. Данный человек либо лжет, либо ошибается. Опытный ткач поможет ему узреть истину... или раскаяться в обмане".
"The Undying One does not release the souls that have come to Him. This man is either lying or misguided. An experienced spinner will help him see the truth... or repent the deception."
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий не отпускает души, что пришли к Нему. Данный человек либо лжет, либо ошибается. Опытный ткач поможет ему узреть истину... или раскаяться в обмане".

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One does not release the souls that have come to him. This man is either lying or misguided. An experienced weaver will help him see the truth... Or repent the deception"

languages.text: "Der Todlose entlässt die Seelen nicht, die zu Ihm kamen. Dieser Mann lügt oder ist fehlgeleitet. Ein erfahrener Spinner wird ihm helfen, die Wahrheit zu sehen ... oder die Täuschung zu bereuen."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not release the souls that have come to Him. This man is either lying or misguided. An experienced spinner will help him see the truth... or repent the deception."

traits.locale_text: "Der Todlose entlässt die Seelen nicht, die zu Ihm kamen. Dieser Mann lügt oder ist fehlgeleitet. Ein erfahrener Spinner wird ihm helfen, die Wahrheit zu sehen ... oder die Täuschung zu bereuen."

languages.text: « L'Immortel ne délivre pas les âmes qui viennent à Lui. Soit cet homme ment, soit il se trompe. Un tisseur expérimenté l'aidera à voir la vérité... ou à expier sa duplicité. »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not release the souls that have come to Him. This man is either lying or misguided. An experienced spinner will help him see the truth... or repent the deception."

traits.locale_text: « L'Immortel ne délivre pas les âmes qui viennent à Lui. Soit cet homme ment, soit il se trompe. Un tisseur expérimenté l'aidera à voir la vérité... ou à expier sa duplicité. »

languages.text: «El Inmortal no libera las almas que acuden a Él. Este hombre miente o está equivocado. Un tejedor experimentado le ayudará a ver la verdad... o a arrepentirse del engaño».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not release the souls that have come to Him. This man is either lying or misguided. An experienced spinner will help him see the truth... or repent the deception."

traits.locale_text: «El Inmortal no libera las almas que acuden a Él. Este hombre miente o está equivocado. Un tejedor experimentado le ayudará a ver la verdad... o a arrepentirse del engaño».

languages.text: 「不死の者は、自分の許に来た魂を解放することはない。この男は嘘をついているか、見当違いをしているのでしょう。熟練のスピナーが真実を見る手助けをする...もしくはその欺瞞を悔い改めさせるだろう」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not release the souls that have come to Him. This man is either lying or misguided. An experienced spinner will help him see the truth... or repent the deception."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者は、自分の許に来た魂を解放することはない。この男は嘘をついているか、見当違いをしているのでしょう。熟練のスピナーが真実を見る手助けをする...もしくはその欺瞞を悔い改めさせるだろう」

languages.text: “不死之神不会放开那些来到祂面前的灵魂。这个人要么是在说谎，要么是遭到了误导。经验丰富的织网者会帮助他看清真相……或让他为他的谎言忏悔。”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not release the souls that have come to Him. This man is either lying or misguided. An experienced spinner will help him see the truth... or repent the deception."

traits.locale_text: “不死之神不会放开那些来到祂面前的灵魂。这个人要么是在说谎，要么是遭到了误导。经验丰富的织网者会帮助他看清真相……或让他为他的谎言忏悔。”

languages.text: "Ölmeyen, O'na gelen ruhları bırakmaz. Bu adam ya yalan söylüyor ya da yanlış bilgilendirilmiş. Deneyimli bir dokur, gerçeği görmesine yardımcı olacaktır... Olmadı tövbe ettirecektir."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One does not release the souls that have come to Him. This man is either lying or misguided. An experienced spinner will help him see the truth... or repent the deception."
